casebody.data:
Tonya Lannette WILLIAMS, and Derrick Scott Hammill, individually and as Personal Representatives of the Estate of Tabith Candace Williams and Tonya Lannette Williams, as parent and legal guardian of the minor
v.
Alvin E. BELL, Individually and American Bass Fishing Club, Inc. No. 86P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. Edmund L. Gaines, Statesville, Christopher D. Mauriello, Salisbury, for Tonya Williams et al. Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte, for Bell & Bass. Stephen W. Coles, Lexington, for American Bass Fishing.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of February 2005 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2005."
